review: My family loves our chromecast.  We repurposed an old 24 inch Asus monitor as a kids TV.  We hooked up a mini soundbar (Bluetooth speaker by anker also 5 stars amazing) and used the aux out on the monitor.  Its perfect.  We have the multiple devices synced with the chromecast.  We mainly use Netflix, plex, and YouTube.  Its positively perfect and dead simple to use and setup.  Great job Google.  Also I leave it plugged in all day...it has this awesome feature where you can display a screensaver type photo stream of random gorgeous landscape photos drawn from the internet or pictures of your own.  Very cool digital picture frame feature.  I love it. 5 stars I can't say that enough.
